scripts.install:all: npm --prefix referral-service i && npm --prefix frontend i
scripts.db:podman:start: podman run --name referral_postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=postgres -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=postgres -e POSTGRES_DB=referral -p 5432:5432 -d docker.io/library/postgres:16-alpine
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd referral-service && npx prisma migrate dev -n init
scripts.dev: bash -lc 'npm run backend:dev & npm run frontend:dev & wait'
scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
